item.title: GenevaGem - Inspecting Orchestration REST
item.description:
GenevaGem - Inspecting Orchestration REST

Since many of the projects I work on are integrations I'm frequently working with custom orchestration activities. Most of these also involve some sort of REST interface. The introduction of ServiceNow's REST Inspector was a huge help, but I wanted to introduce you to another tool I found extremely useful.

item.title: HelsinkiHint - Source Control
item.description:
HelsinkiHint - Source Control

"How do we backup our app and manage file versions?" This is usually one of the first questions I get when I start working with a new software vendor who's building an app for the ServiceNow store.
